body: True story: So I'm on walls playing tetris swamp and I get the Evil Witch Pickaxe  and I'm mining the diamonds and I see on of my teammates come down realizing hes too late to get the pic and diamonds.  I'm thinking he must be soo sad he missed the diamonds, so I kindly give him 4 out of 10 of the diamonds I mined.  And then this troll decides to drop lava on me.  So now I'm really upset that this sad meatloaf that you call a player team killed but killed me AFTER I give him diamonds.  Now I report him but no mod shows up, don't blame em' got other problems to deal with in the server.  I stay simply because I want to see him die.  He not only kills me but decides to take out the other guy of our team.  Now I'm really upset, but what really what riles me up every time this happens is the guy wins the whole map solo.  Has this ever happened to you and what moment in avicus gets you mad when it happens?

replies.body:
Next time you get team killed, please use the /report command. It will notify all staff online and at least one will attend and investigate your report. You might as well report the player a few times if you see that no staff are coming. Also, we do not notify players when we investigate a report, so the staff may be there without you knowing.

If no one comes, get some evidence (screenshot/video) and post them under the player reports forum tab.
